ygData.subject: RE: [The EverQuest Tavern] Macros Arggggg
ygData.msgSnippet: My enchanter had a macro command for casting three spells in combat.  The first was a Tashani, then then a debuff spell, then the choke spell, then a /say of
ygData.messageBody:
My enchanter had a macro command for casting three spells in combat. The
first was a Tashani, then then a debuff spell, then the choke spell, then a
/say of Now choking %T just for fun!

Try this macro out in a hot key.... place your spells of choice in the spell
jewel positions and change the /pause timers so that you get enough time
between spells. This is also helpfull for clerics as you can use the %T
command to tell the person you are healing to STAY PUT! I use similar macro
buttons for letting everyone know the enchanter is in trouble and needs
help....."HEY! Get this %T off of me! NO! NO! NOT THE FACE! Crap, this is
gonna hurt!" works really good.

/caste 1, /pause 65
/caste 2, /pause 70
/say Burn baby burn!, /pause 10
/caste 3, /sit

I do not remember the macro commands for skills such as beg, but if someone
does, please post it.

Thanks,

Jeff
-----Original Message-----
From: PsyKo [mailto:sibilant_ghost@...]
Sent: Monday, November 04, 2002 4:40 PM
To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Macros Arggggg


Actually, automated combat seems like an interesting
concept.... I would like to do the same with the
begging skill... beg.. wait 30 seconds .. beg.. and
just do that till the person kills me.. or in the case
of a pet .. just beg till the pet wishes he could kill
me.


--- Christine <valzog@...> wrote:
> Hello,
> Im trying to make a macro to cast a spell, wait 2
> seconds and cast
> another spell. How do I do this? I cant seem to get
> it to work. Has
> anyone made a macro like this? If so please tell me
> how you did it.
> Thanks
> Christine
>
>
